an4.124:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.124:1.4: So yadeva tattha hoti rupagatam vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam, te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato parato palokato sunnato anattato samanupassati.
an4.124:1.5: So kayassa bheda param marana suddhavasanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an4.124:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam …pe… tatiyam jhanam …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.124:2.2: So yadeva tattha hoti rupagatam vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam, te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato parato palokato sunnato anattato samanupassati.
an4.124:2.3: So kayassa bheda param marana suddhavasanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an4.124:2.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
